mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.order_cross_product_detail_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.orderCrossProductDetailId},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.order_cross_product_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.orderCrossProductId},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.order_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.orderNo},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.goodsName},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.goods_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.goodsCode},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.batch_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.batchNo},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.plan_amount LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.planAmount},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.real_amount LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.realAmount},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.remark},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.user_defined1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined1},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.user_defined2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined2},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.user_defined3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined3},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.user_defined4 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined4},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.user_defined5 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined5},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.createBy},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.gmt_create LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtCreate},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.last_modified_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.lastModifiedBy},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.gmt_modified LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtModified},'%')
and wms_order_cross_product_deail_.active_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.activeFlag},'%')
mapper.update:
update wms_order_cross_product_deail
order_cross_product_id = #{entity.orderCrossProductId},
order_no = #{entity.orderNo},
goods_name = #{entity.goodsName},
goods_code = #{entity.goodsCode},
batch_no = #{entity.batchNo},
plan_amount = #{entity.planAmount},
real_amount = #{entity.realAmount},
remark = #{entity.remark},
user_defined1 = #{entity.userDefined1},
user_defined2 = #{entity.userDefined2},
user_defined3 = #{entity.userDefined3},
user_defined4 = #{entity.userDefined4},
user_defined5 = #{entity.userDefined5},
create_by = #{entity.createBy},
gmt_create = #{entity.gmtCreate},
last_modified_by = #{entity.lastModifiedBy},
gmt_modified = #{entity.gmtModified},
active_flag = #{entity.activeFlag},
where order_cross_product_detail_id = #{entity.orderCrossProductDetailId} and active_flag = '1'

update wms_order_cross_product_deail
order_cross_product_id = #{entity.orderCrossProductId},
order_no = #{entity.orderNo},
goods_name = #{entity.goodsName},
goods_code = #{entity.goodsCode},
batch_no = #{entity.batchNo},
plan_amount = #{entity.planAmount},
real_amount = #{entity.realAmount},
real_amount = real_amount + #{entity.realAmountAdd},
remark = #{entity.remark},
user_defined1 = #{entity.userDefined1},
user_defined2 = #{entity.userDefined2},
user_defined3 = #{entity.userDefined3},
user_defined4 = #{entity.userDefined4},
user_defined5 = #{entity.userDefined5},
create_by = #{entity.createBy},
gmt_create = #{entity.gmtCreate},
last_modified_by = #{entity.lastModifiedBy},
gmt_modified = #{entity.gmtModified},
active_flag = #{entity.activeFlag},
where order_cross_product_detail_id = #{entity.orderCrossProductDetailId} and ISNULL(plan_amount, 0) > ISNULL(real_amount, 0) and active_flag = '1'
mapper.select:
SELECT t.order_cross_product_detail_id, t.order_cross_product_id, s.out_address, t.order_no, t.goods_name, t.goods_code, t.batch_no, t.plan_amount, t.real_amount, t.remark, t.user_defined1, t.user_defined2, t.user_defined3, t.user_defined4, t.user_defined5, t.create_by, t.gmt_create, t.last_modified_by, t.gmt_modified, t.active_flag FROM wms_order_cross_product_deail t JOIN wms_order_cross_product s ON t.order_cross_product_id = s.order_cross_product_id AND s.order_status = '2' AND t.active_flag = '1' AND s.active_flag = '1'
WHERE ISNULL(t.plan_amount, 0) > ISNULL(t.real_amount, 0) AND t.goods_code = #{entity.goodsCode} AND t.batch_no = #{entity.batchNo}
